title: Steins;Gate: Kyoukaimenjou no Missing Link
alternative_title: Steins;Gate: Kyoukaimenjou no Missing Link - Divide By Zero, シュタインズ・ゲート境界面上のミッシングリンク-Divide By Zero-
description: Alternate 23rd episode of Steins;Gate, which leads into the story of Steins;Gate 0. It will be included with the Steins;Gate Complete Blu-ray Box.
